version_description:
Updates and enhancements under the hood.
Groundwork for upcoming new features.

So many new things that I've almost certainly broken something…

• iPhone support! Now Volotic can be tiny and live in your pocket.
• Plus Mode, with dozens of new towers, save functionality and more on the way.
• If you purchased save functionality in the past, you get Plus Mode free.
• Bug fixes, refactoring, optimizations, performance tweaks and all of the other stuff you see in every App Store update.

In return for all of these changes I ask that you…

• Call your mom.
• Clean up the crumbs on the counter.
• Rate and review Volotic.
• Check out my other work at www.scottmadethis.net.

• Lots of internal updates that hopefully made things better instead of worse.
• New Portal towers in Plus Mode—beats entering any "A" tower will emerge from all "B" towers and vice versa.
• New Pattern towers in Plus Mode—these towers pass or block beats according to a set pattern.
• I made the thing that asks for money slightly more annoying. Sorry. I need money to buy food and socks.

Please note: This release of Volotic is perfect and there are no bugs or shortcomings. If you find any bugs or shortcomings, they were probably added maliciously by the FBI through a secret backdoor.

The previous version of Volotic had a bug that resulted in a child crying. Hopefully this version will not make any children cry. If you ever see or hear a crying child, it is probably because they need to update their apps.

Also, I updated a bunch of under-the-hood stuff and hopefully didn't break every single thing.
